{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Linksys EA7300.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Max-Stream AC1750 MU-MIMO Gigabit Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7300/ |sp = http://support.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t340000046qvvAAA |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Linksys_EA7300_v1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = EA7300 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/23/2016â€Ž |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys EA7300 v1 |wlclass = AC1750 |series = EA7300 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-EA7300 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = BWY00C-1.6MM |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT6CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 60:38:E0 |oui = 60:38:E0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = LinksysXXXXX, LinksysXXXXX 5GHz |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = US/CA |fccapprovdate = 09/01/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 150 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833124633 |asin = B01JOXW58I |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/userguide/EA7300_UG_INTL.pdf User guide]
{{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/inbox/linksys/linksys_ea7300}} :"BWY00C-1.6MM" is silkscrened on the board image shown. This would indicate SerComm manufacture.
{{WiFiCert|WFA67654|2016-10-07}}
==Links of Interest== image @: https://www.linksys.com/resources/img/features/ea7300/linksys-li-EA7300-1.jpg
User Guide https://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/userguide/EA7300_UG_INTL.pdf
Latest Firmware (Ver. 1.0.11.200282 3/30/2020) https://downloads.linksys.com/support/assets/firmware/FW_EA7300_1.0.11.200282_prod.img
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_ea7300_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/ea7300_v1 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- autos --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Notes== ===Product Features=== <!-- needs to be incorperated into infobox --> *AC1750 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Gigabit (450+1300 Mbps) *802.11abgn/ac, N450 (2.4 GHz) + AC1300 (5 GHz) *Simultaneous Dual-Band, 3x3 Spatial Streams *Beamforming Technology, Seamless Roaming *Antennas: One (1x) internal antenna (?), :Three (3x) external non-detachable dipole antennas *Guest Access: Supports up to 50 guests, :both 2.4/5GHz bands have a unique Network Name (SSID) *Ports: One (1x) WAN / Internet Gigabit port :Four (4x) LAN / Ethernet Gigabit ports :One (1x) USB 3.0 port with a current draw of up to 1100mA ::Digital Living Network Alliance (DLNA)-compatible ::Virtual printing support, Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) *Switch/Button: One (1x) rocket-style power switch :One (1x) reset push-button to restore factory default settings :One (1x) Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) push-button *Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) 2.0 <!-- ===EA7300 v2 Product Features:=== *0.88GHz Dual-Core Processor ([[MediaTek]] MT7621AT ) *AC1750 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Gigabit (450+1300 Mbps) *802.11abgn/ac, N450 (2.4GHz) + AC1300 (5GHz) *Simultaneous Dual-Band, 3x3 Spatial Streams (x2 - MediaTek MT7615N) *Beamforming Technology, Seamless Roaming *Antennas: One (1x) internal antenna (?), :Three (3x) external non-detachable dipole antennas *Guest Access: Supports up to 50 guests, :Both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands have a unique Network Name (SSID) *Ports: One (1x) WAN / Internet Gigabit port :Four (4x) LAN / Ethernet Gigabit ports :One (1x) USB 3.0 port with a current draw of up to 1100mA ::Digital Living Network Alliance (DLNA)-compatible ::Virtual printing support, Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) *Switch/Button: One (1x) rocket-style Power switch :One (1x) Reset push-button to restore factory default settings :One (1x) Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) push-button *Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) 2.0 -->
